Works Valerio Patricolo Contacts

3D Sentinels

I am very proud of this work: the project was an exciting challenge and the final result was shared by Copernicus, a European program for observing the Earth from space. I was responsible for reproducing the 6 orbiting sentinels around the Earth in 3D and integrating them into the website in order to offer an interactive experience. This project challenged me in both modeling, texturing, and programming. It was a very rewarding adventure.

Beretta M9A3

This is one of the most detailed models I have ever created. Developed in 3DS Max and reproduced from Beretta's original blueprints, this firearm accurately reproduces the Beretta M9A3 model. It is currently available for download on Turbosquid.

Face mapping

In terms of fun, this project definitely ranks at the top. At a friend's event, I reproduced this face for a large-scale wall video mapping. The face was modeled using real reference images which were also used for texturing. One of my favorite details is the attention to the hair, which follows the real model and, together with the lighting, provides a very realistic result. In addition, you can also see small details of texture painting such as the small tattoo under the eye.
